content:
For creating a healthcare service directory, HealthcareService and Location BOTH have telecom and hours of operation (Organization all has telecom).

I am trying to create rules about what the distinction is between having telecom/hours in either of those spots.

Are there some general guidelines available for what distinguishes whether to use HealthcareService vs. Location for telecom+hours? (or us both)?

Location is typically around general hours the place is open.
HealthcareService may or may not use those hours, but could
